mod.name: Duelist Mod
mod.credits:
Thanks to Gremious for his amazing work with the Default Mod base, without which the Duelist would not exist! 

Big shoutout to Playmaker for various art contributions: character selection button, spellcaster deck selection screen art, and the newer Yugi character model! 

Thanks to DarkVexon for his awesome relic damage animation! 

Thanks to Pastykake, Rocketchu, magekirbys, Avret, Drogoroth, NullChaos, PheonixLord, joel.strange, Captain Buggy, spencerws88 and everyone else I forgot to mention for providing consistent suggestions on balancing, bug reports, and other general feedback to help improve the mod!
mod.description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 


Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464

relics.name: Millennium Puzzle
relics.description: At the start of each combat, trigger an effect depending on your chosen starting deck.
relics.flavorText: It was originally known as the Millennium Pendant, but after being shattered and requiring assembly it came to be known as the Millennium Puzzle.

relics.name: Bug Token
relics.description: Whenever you apply Poison from Tributing an Insect, add 1 extra poison. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, have a 25% chance to further increase this Poison buff by 1.
relics.flavorText: A dirty token shaped like a beetle.

relics.name: Machine Orb
relics.description: All Explosive Tokens deal extra damage.
relics.flavorText: A mechanical orb that seems to be ticking?

relics.name: Machine Token
relics.description: Explosive Tokens deal damage randomly to enemies instead of damaging you.
relics.flavorText: A mechanical token covered with small wires and strange markings. Best not fiddle with it too much.

relics.name: Metronometry
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add 3 random Metronomes to your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: The study of blast beats.

relics.name: Millennium Rod
relics.description: At the start of each turn, add a Randomized Spell to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Priest Seto had originally owned the Millennium Rod. Along with the other Items, it was used to resurrect Zorc Necrophades.

relics.name: Nature Orb
relics.description: Vines gained by playing Naturia cards is increased by 1.
relics.flavorText: An orb covered with leaves and dirt. How odd.

relics.name: Orb of Slifer
relics.description: Your Air orbs always Channel a random orb.
relics.flavorText: A strange orb with mysterious power.

relics.name: Shadow Token
relics.description: Your Shadow orbs spawn with 2 extra damage per Resummon.
relics.flavorText: A smoldering, soot covered token. It's very hot!

relics.name: Solidified Metronome
relics.description: Whenever you play a Metronome, gain 2 Block.
relics.flavorText: A sturdy metronome made from a piece of rock.

relics.name: Spellcaster Orb
relics.description: Whenever you Channel an orb deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: A glowing purple orb that seems to hold a mysterious power.

relics.name: Stone of Exxod
relics.description: Each time you shuffle your deck, add a random Exodia card to your hand.
relics.flavorText: A fragment of the Forbidden One?

relics.name: Summoning Anchor
relics.description: Summon 1 Relic Token at the start of each combat.
relics.flavorText: A small red and yellow anchor. What a strange color scheme.

relics.name: Aqua Orb
relics.description:
When you gain Summons from Tributing an Aqua, gain 1 extra Summon.
Synergy: Aqua Token
relics.flavorText: A small blue sphere that smells a bit salty.

relics.name: Aqua Token
relics.description: When you Tribute an Aqua for another, decrease the Tributes of all monsters in your hand by 1 for this turn.
relics.flavorText: A small blue token shaped like seashell. It is quite damp.

relics.name: Bonus Pack Orb
relics.description: Bonus Booster packs contain 5 cards instead of 3.
relics.flavorText: More cards for everyone!

relics.name: Cartoon Statue
relics.description: When you apply Vulnerable from Tributing a Toon, apply 1 extra Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: A small colorful statue!

relics.name: Dragon Orb

relics.flavorText: A small red orb.

relics.name: Dragon Statue

relics.flavorText: A small statue shaped like a dragon.

relics.name: Egg Token
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add 3 Monster Eggs (with modified stats) to your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: A small egg-shaped token. Seems valuable.

Starts with 1 Charge.
Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain 2 Charges.
relics.flavorText: A Gift from Anubis himself.

relics.description:
Right click in a shop to activate.
Refresh all cards, relics, and potions in the shop. Apply Upgrades to a random type of card. Starts with 2 Charges. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, this relic has a 50% chance to gain 1 Charge.
relics.flavorText: A rug necklace? The Merchant is such a weird dude.

relics.name: Metronomic Power
relics.description: Whenever you gain Strength, add a Randomized Metronome to your hand.
relics.flavorText: You feel a strong pulsing sensation when holding this relic.

relics.name: Millennium Coin
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain 100 Gold for each other Millennium Item you have.
relics.flavorText: A beautiful coin.

relics.name: Millennium Eye
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain Toon World.
relics.flavorText: It was created 3,000 years prior with other Millennium Items by Aknadin. After its creation, Aknadin himself put on the Eye, sacrificing his left eye in the process.

relics.name: Millennium Ring
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Increment 3.
relics.flavorText: 3,000 years before present day events, the Millennium Ring and the other Millennium Items were forged in Kul Elna by sacrificing 99 souls of the Kul Elna villagers.

relics.name: Reward Orb
relics.description: Whenever you win combat, receive 1 extra card reward and consume 1 Charge. Starts with 5 Charges.
relics.flavorText: A very helpful orb.

relics.name: Reward Orb+
relics.description: Whenever you win combat, have a 3% chance to receive 4 extra card rewards.
relics.flavorText: A strange orb.

relics.name: Reward Stone
relics.description: Whenever you win combat, have a 20% chance to receive 2 extra card rewards.
relics.flavorText: A strange stone.

relics.name: Reward Token
relics.description: Whenever you win combat, receive 1 extra card reward and consume 1 Charge. Starts with 0 Charges. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain 2 Charges.
relics.flavorText: A very helpful token.

relics.name: Reward Token+
relics.description: Whenever you win combat, receive 2 extra card rewards and consume 1 Charge. Starts with 1 Charge. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain 1 Charge.
relics.flavorText: A VERY helpful token.

relics.name: Spellcaster Stone
relics.description: Start each combat with 5 Magicka and 2 Weak.
relics.flavorText: A glowing purple stone that seems to hold a marvelous power.

relics.name: Spellcaster Token
relics.description: Whenever you Channel an orb Channel an additional random orb.
relics.flavorText: A glowing purple token that seems to hold a mysterious power.

relics.name: Tribute Egg
relics.description: Whenever you add a Tribute monster that costs 2 or more Tributes to your deck, reduce its Tribute cost by 1.
relics.flavorText: A glowing red egg shaped object. It holds mysterious power.

relics.name: Upgrade Stone
relics.description: Increase the chances of receiving better Booster packs. No longer receive Common Boosters.
relics.flavorText: Get yourself some high quality card packs!

relics.name: Yugi's Mirror
relics.description: Upon pickup, duplicate a random Tribute card in your deck. The duplicated copy costs 0.
relics.flavorText: I look funny in this.

relics.name: Zombie Statue
relics.description: When you gain Block from Resummoning a Zombie, gain 5 extra Block.
relics.flavorText: A small statue shaped like a zombie.

relics.name: Booster Egg
relics.description: All cards received from Booster packs are Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: Get some upgrades!

relics.name: Booster Power Token
relics.description: Every Booster pack reward has a 50% chance to roll an All Rares Booster.
relics.flavorText: These are some seriously good pulls!

relics.name: Burning Statue
relics.description: Dragons always apply Burning to their targets.
relics.flavorText: A small red dragon-shaped statue.

relics.name: Dragon Pendant
relics.description: Every other time you Tribute a Dragon for another Dragon, draw 1 Rare card.
relics.flavorText: A small necklace with a pendant shaped like a dragon.

relics.name: Leafblower
relics.description: Increase Block gained by Leaves by 20%.
relics.flavorText: Blow those leaves

relics.name: Magician's Anchor
relics.description: Summon 2 random Tokens at the start of each combat.
relics.flavorText: This strange anchor appears to be imbided with powerful magic...

relics.name: Mark of Nature
relics.description: Whenever you Tribute a Naturia for another, gain 1 extra Vine.
relics.flavorText: It's prickly

relics.name: Millennium Branch
relics.description: At the start of turn, Resummon a random monster you have played this run for every 2 cards you Exhausted on the previous turn.
relics.flavorText: The branch of a tree from the Ancient Egyptian era.

relics.name: Spell Bowl
relics.description: Whenever you add a Spell to your deck, gain 1 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: A Spell a day keeps the Spellcasters away.

relics.name: Vine Orb
relics.description: Increase damage of Vines by 20%.
relics.flavorText: Oohh, Vines!

relics.name: White Bowl
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Channel a White.
relics.flavorText: Get some upgrades!

relics.name: Apprentice War
relics.description: ALL enemies start combat with 10% less HP.
relics.flavorText: Not quite battle ready...

relics.name: Ascended Greed
relics.description: Whenever you obtain a card, gain 15 Gold. Whenever you obtain the same card twice in a row, gain 25 Gold.
relics.flavorText: You are quite greedy!

relics.name: Ascended Hunger
relics.description: Whenever you obtain a potion, gain 2 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: You are quite hungry!

relics.name: Ascended Power
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 3 Juggernaut.
relics.flavorText: You have become Ascended!

relics.name: Ascended War
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Tribute monster, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: You are quite the Warrior!

relics.name: Duelist Power
relics.description: Every other turn, gain 4 Vigor.
relics.flavorText: I'm running out of flavor text ideas.

relics.name: Duelist War
relics.description: At the start of Boss and Elite combats, gain 3 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Getting more powerful...

relics.name: Millennium Necklace
relics.description: Receive an extra potion reward after every combat.
relics.flavorText: The Millennium Necklace was originally owned by an unnamed high priestess under Aknamkanon, later by Isis under Atem, in Ancient Egypt.

relics.name: Millennium Scale
relics.description:
Whenever you Tribute with matching monster types,
gain 3 Temporary HP.
relics.flavorText: Also known as the Scales of Truth, The Scale was originally owned by Karim.

relics.name: Millennium Token
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose any Duelist card to add to your deck. Your Tokens always cost 0.
relics.flavorText: A very powerful token.

relics.name: Nameless
relics.description: You chose to rest in a place where an ancient evil lives.
relics.flavorText: You succumbed to the Tomb of the Nameless...

relics.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Coin
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain 30 Gold for each other relic you have.
relics.flavorText: A very beautiful coin!

relics.name: Gambler's Chip
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Whenever you attempt to obtain a card, have a 50% chance to not receive the card.
relics.flavorText: You can see a small inscription on one side. It reads: "Yugi's Lucky Chip!"

relics.name: Haunted Pendant
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Start each combat Haunted.
relics.flavorText: A small grey necklace shaped like a ghost. Creepy!

relics.name: Metronomic
relics.description: Whenever you play a Metronome, Resummon another random Metronome on a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: A pristine, high quality, wooden metronome. Gotta practice those paradiddles!

relics.name: Millennium Key
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Your max Summons cannot be higher than 5.
relics.flavorText: After it was made, the Millennium Key was given to Solomon Muto's Egyptian incarnate, Shimon, but later it was passed on to Shada.

relics.name: Aknamkanon's Essence
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 10 Tomb Looter.
relics.flavorText: How can I have this?

relics.name: Battletome
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose any Monster to add to your deck.
relics.flavorText: A yellow, glowing book.

relics.name: Bonus Orb
relics.description: Always receive a Bonus Booster pack with any Booster rewards.
relics.flavorText: All bonus packs. All the time.

relics.name: Booster Bonanza
relics.description: Booster pack rewards are always Bonanza Packs, which contain 5 random cards.
relics.flavorText: So you like to gamble?

relics.name: Magnet Stimulus
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain all basic Magnet Warriors and Valkyrion. Lose 10 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: Get some Magnets!

relics.name: Mark of Exxod
relics.description: You can no longer obtain duplicate cards. Gain 10 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: This brand was used by Ancient Egyptians to signify warriors who had successfully summoned Exodia in battle.

relics.name: Merchant's Pendant
relics.description: Upon pickup, refresh the entire shop. Apply Upgrades to a random type of card. Apply a random discount to everything in the shop.
relics.flavorText: A rug pendant? The Merchant is such a weird fellow.

relics.name: Merchant's Rugbox
relics.description: Upon pickup, duplicate all Traps in your deck.
relics.flavorText: A whole box of the merchant's used up rugs. These really could use a wash...

relics.name: Merchant's Sword
relics.description: Upon pickup, duplicate all Monsters in your deck.
relics.flavorText: How can a sword even be rug-shaped?

relics.name: Merchant's Talisman
relics.description: Upon pickup, duplicate all Spells in your deck.
relics.flavorText: It's all rugs. All his stuff is rugs. Even this weird talisman thing is rug-shaped.

relics.name: Millennium Puzzle
relics.description: At the start of each combat, trigger an effect depending on your chosen starting deck.
relics.flavorText: It was originally known as the Millennium Pendant, but after being shattered and requiring assembly it came to be known as the Millennium Puzzle.

relics.name: Millennium Symbol
relics.description: Increase the number of Millennium Puzzle effects you may choose to 3.
relics.flavorText: This symbol seems to fit right into the Millennium Puzzle...

relics.name: Monsterbox
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 5 random monster types. Replace ALL monsters from your deck with an equal number of random monsters from the chosen type.
relics.flavorText: A box of monsters!

relics.name: Nature Token
relics.description: If you apply at least 35 Poison in combat, drop an extra Booster reward.
relics.flavorText: An orb covered with mud and grass. Gross.

relics.name: Orbstone
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 4 random orb cards to add to your deck. Orb cards are 0-cost Spells that Channel orbs.
relics.flavorText: A blue, glowing stone.

relics.name: Shop Token
relics.description: You will encounter rarer relics in the shop more often.
relics.flavorText: A weird looking rug shaped token.

relics.name: Spellheart
relics.description: Upon pickup, remove ALL Spells from your deck. Gain 4 Max HP for each Spell removed.
relics.flavorText: A tasty magical fruit, usually consumed by magicians.

relics.name: Spelltome
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose any Spell to add to your deck.
relics.flavorText: A green, glowing book.

relics.name: Spiretome
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose any Red or Colorless card to add to your deck.
relics.flavorText: A multi-colored, glowing book.

relics.name: Trap Vortex
relics.description: Upon pickup, remove ALL Traps from your deck. At the start of each combat, gain Blur equal to the number of Traps removed.
relics.flavorText: A localized black hole. Neat?

relics.name: Tricktome
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose any Trap to add to your deck.
relics.flavorText: A purple, glowing book.

potions.name: Bottled Kuriboh
potions.description: Increment 3.

potions.name: Bottled Summons
potions.description: Summon 4 Potion Tokens.

potions.name: Bottled Tokens
potions.description: Resummon 2 Block Tokens.

potions.name: Debuff Vial
potions.description: Apply 12 Poison to ALL enemies. Gain a 2 turn random debuff.

potions.name: Joey Juice
potions.description: Deal 4 damage for each of your max summons.

potions.name: Bottled Dragons
potions.description: Resummon 2 Baby Dragons.

potions.name: Bottled Harp
potions.description: Resummon 2 Spirits of the Harp.

potions.name: Debuff Armor
potions.description: Gain 18 Block. Gain a 2 turn random debuff.

potions.name: Debuff Fury
potions.description: Gain 4 Strength and Dexterity. Gain a 4 turn random debuff.

potions.name: Imperial Potion
potions.description: Gain 3 Reductionist. Reduce your Max Summons by 1.

potions.name: Magic Bottle
potions.description: Reduce the Tribute cost of all monsters in your hand by 1 for this turn.

potions.name: Metallicize Potion
potions.description: Gain 4 Metallicize. Reduce your Max Summons by 1.

potions.name: Millennium Elixir
potions.description: Gain 2 random buffs.

potions.name: Small Booster
potions.description: Open a Legend of Blue Eyes booster pack. Add 3 Randomized cards from this set to your hand.

potions.name: Small Pack
potions.description: Open a booster pack containing cards from Pharaoh's Servant and Metal Raiders. Add 3 Randomized cards from either of these sets to your hand.

potions.name: Summoner's Armor
potions.description: Gain 18 Block. Reduce your Max Summons by 1. Affected by Dexterity.

potions.name: Summoner's Fury
potions.description: Gain 2 Strength and Dexterity. Reduce your Max Summons by 1.

potions.name: Summoner's Vial
potions.description: Apply 12 Poison to ALL enemies. Reduce your Max Summons by 2.

potions.name: Themed Booster
potions.description:
Open a booster pack containing cards of the last type that you Summoned.
Add 3 Randomized cards from this type to your hand.

potions.name: Barricade Potion
potions.description: Gain Barricade. Reduce your Max Summons by 2.

potions.name: Destruct Potion
potions.description: Tribute all of your summons and gain 2 max HP for each.

potions.name: Destruction Potion
potions.description: Tribute all of your summons. Obtain a random relic. Tributing more monsters will increase your chances of receiving a rarer relic.

potions.name: Dragon Souls
potions.description: Resummon 2 random Dragons on random enemies.

potions.name: Fairy's Gift
potions.description: Gain 4 Regen. Heal 4 HP.

potions.name: Large Booster
potions.description: Open a 5 card booster pack. Cards are Randomized. Guaranteed to receive at least one Rare card.

potions.name: Magician's Bottle
potions.description: Reduce the Tribute cost of all monsters in your hand by 2 for the rest of combat.

potions.name: Mayhem Potion
potions.description: Gain 2 Mayhem. Reduce your Max Summons by 3.

potions.name: Upgraded Booster
potions.description: Open a 3 card booster pack. Cards are Randomized and Upgraded. Guaranteed to receive one Rare card.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Air
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, have a chance to Channel a random offensive Orb. You have a higher chance if all monsters summoned are Dragons.
Evoke: Increase your Orb slots by 1.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Alien
keywords.description:
Orb: Whenever you play a card, draw 1 card and discard a random card.
Evoke: Discard your hand and draw a card for each card discarded.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Anticrystal
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn: draw 1 card, gain 4 emporary HP, and add 1 Randomized Spell to your hand.
Evoke: Cycles to the next Anticrystal effect at the end of each turn.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Aqua
keywords.description: When you Tribute an Aqua for another Aqua, increase the Summons of all monsters in your hand by 1 for this turn.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Arcane
keywords.description: Can be Upgraded more than one time.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Black
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, discard 2 random cards from your draw pile.
Evoke: Deal 2 damage to ALL enemies for each card in your discard pile.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Blaze
keywords.description:
Orb: Whenever you Tribute, deal 4 damage to a random enemy.
Evoke: Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies. Evoke damage increases at the end of each turn while you have no water-based orbs channeled.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Bug
keywords.description: The 2nd Bug you play each combat gives you 5 Temporary HP.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Burning
keywords.description: Debuff that deals damage to the owner at the start of even turns. On odd turns, Burning is increased by 1 and has a chance to spread to other enemies.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Chaotic
keywords.description: In this Stance, whenever you Exhaust a card, increase the magic number of a card in your hand by 1 for the rest of combat. Whenever you Block, randomize the amount of Block you gain.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Cold-Blooded
keywords.description: Cold-Blooded are Status cards that Retain and reduce your max summons when Retained.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Consumer
keywords.description:
Orb: Whenever you Exhaust a card, Evoke another random orb.
Evoke: For each orb Evoked by this orb's passive effect, gain 2 Energy at the start of the next turn.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Crystal
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, gain 2 Focus until the end of turn.
Evoke: Apply Weak to a random enemy 4 times.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Dinosaur
keywords.description: Dinosaurs deal 10% more damage for each stack of Weak on their targets.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:DragonOrb
keywords.description: Orb: At the start of turn, gain 3 Dragonscales and choose 1 of 3 Randomized Dragons to add to your hand.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Dragonscale
keywords.description: Block and damage of Dragons is increased by 1 for every 4 Dragonscales you have.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Earth
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, add 1 Randomized Spell to your hand.
Evoke: Set the cost of 1 random Spell in your hand to 0.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Entrenched
keywords.description: In this Stance, Superheavy cards have a low chance to apply Plated Armor or Metallicize when played.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Erupt
keywords.description: Erupt effects are triggered on all cards in your hand whenever you Evoke any Lava orbs.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Exempt
keywords.description: Cannot be Resummoned.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Exodia
keywords.description: Playing unique pieces of Exodia will add 1 to your Exodia power.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Fiend
keywords.description: When you Tribute a Fiend for another Fiend, place 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Fire
keywords.description:
Orb: Whenever you play a card, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Evoke: Reduce the Tribute cost of Dragons (everywhere) by 1 for the rest of combat.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Forsaken
keywords.description: In this Stance, whenever you Exhaust a card, deal damage equal to your Dexterity to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Frozen
keywords.description: Frozen characters take 200% more damage and deal 70% less damage for one turn.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Gadget
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, gain 2 Dexterity until the end of turn.
Evoke: Play a random Skill you have played this combat on a random enemy.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Giant
keywords.description: Giants are powerful monsters with high costs and unique cost reduction effects that trigger from any pile in combat. When played, these cost reductions are reset.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Glass
keywords.description:
Orb: No passive effect.
Evoke: Gain Strength equal to a random enemy's Strength.
Glass is unaffected by Focus.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Glitch
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, trigger 1 random effect. If all monsters summoned are Machines, trigger the effect twice.
Evoke: Trigger 2 random effects.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Guarded
keywords.description: When you enter this stance, gain 1 Blur. Upon exiting this stance, gain Block equal to your Dexterity.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Haunted
keywords.description: Debuff that chooses a random type of card. For the rest of combat, all cards of this type cost 0. Whenever you play a card of this type, trigger a random negative effect.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Hellfire
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, gain 2 Strength until end of turn.
Evoke: Apply Vulnerable to a random enemy 1 time(s).

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Immortal
keywords.description: If an Immortal card is in the discard pile, gain [E] at the start of turn.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Invert
keywords.description: Invert is the same as Evoke, except that you also Channel an Orb that is the 'opposite' of the one you Evoked.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Lava
keywords.description:
Orb: Whenever you Increment, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies.
Evoke: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy for each card in your hand.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Leaves
keywords.description: At the start of turn, if you have at least 5 Leaves, you may choose to consume your Leaves and gain Block. Block amount depends on the number of Leaves you have and the number of Naturias currently summoned.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Light
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, reduces a random one of your debuffs by 1.
Evoke: Permanently enhances all your other channeled orbs by 1.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Machine
keywords.description: Every other time you Tribute a Machine for another Machine, gain 1 Artifact.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Magicka
keywords.description:
When you gain Block via the Spellcaster effect, you gain additional Block based on how much Magicka you currently have.

Magicka resets to 0 when you trigger it, and at the end of the turn is set to the number of Spellcasters you currently have summoned.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Malicious
keywords.description: Enemies have a chance to become Vulnerable whenever a Malicious card is drawn.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Meditative
keywords.description: Upon exiting this stance, gain Vigor equal to twice your Dexterity.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Megatyped
keywords.description: Considered to be ALL monster types (Aqua, Dragon, Fiend, Insect, Machine, Naturia, Plant, Predaplant, Rock, Spellcaster, Superheavy, Toon, Warrior, Wyrm, and Zombie).

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Metal
keywords.description:
Orb: At the end of turn, gain Block equal to half the number of Spells played this combat plus 1.
Evoke: Gain Metallicize 3.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Metallicize
keywords.description: At the end of turn, gain Block equal to the amount of Metallicize stacks you currently have.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:MillenniumOrb
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, activate the Millennium Puzzle.
Evoke: Choose 1 of 20 Randomized cards from the current card pool to add to your hand.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Mist
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, Increment 2.
Evoke: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy for each of your max summons.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:MonsterOrb
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, add 1 Monster Egg to your hand.
Evoke: Set the cost of 1 random monster in your hand to 0.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Moon
keywords.description:
Orb: Whenever you draw a Tribute monster, Upgrade it.
Evoke: Gain 10 Block.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Mud
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, apply 2 Poison to ALL enemies.
Evoke: Gain 3 Thorns.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Naturia
keywords.description: Whenever you play a Naturia monster, gain 1 Vine. Whenever you Tribute a Naturia for another, gain 1 Leaf.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Nimble
keywords.description: In this Stance, whenever you play a card, have a 25% chance to reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 for the turn.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Randomized
keywords.description: Randomized cards may have their costs changed, Tribute costs reduced, Summons increased, may Exhaust, and may become Upgraded or Ethereal.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Reckless
keywords.description: Has a chance to apply Vulnerable to enemies that do not receive attack damage.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Rock
keywords.description: At the end of each turn, gain 2 Block for each Rock you have summoned.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Roulette
keywords.description: 50% chance to trigger the action given after this keyword.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Samurai
keywords.description: In this Stance, Block from cards is improved by 3. Upon exiting this Stance, gain 1 Dexterity.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Sand
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, apply 4 Slow to a random enemy.
Evoke: Apply 8 Slow to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Shadow
keywords.description:
Orb: Whenever you Resummon, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
Evoke: Resummon 2 random monsters from your discard pile on random enemies.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Smoke
keywords.description:
Orb: Whenver you draw a monster, increase its damage by 4.
Evoke: Sum the energy and tribute cost of all cards in your hand. Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to 2x this sum.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Spectral
keywords.description: In this Stance, Warriors deal double damage and you cannot Block.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Spellbook
keywords.description: Power cards that enable Spellcaster synergy Tribute effects. You can only have one Spellbook active at a time.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Spider
keywords.description: The 3rd Spider you play each combat gives you 7 Temporary HP.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Splash
keywords.description:
Orb: Whenever you trigger an Overflow effect or play a monster with 3 or more Summons, deal 9 damage and apply Weak to ALL enemies.
Evoke: Increase the Summons of monsters (everywhere) by 1 for this combat.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Stampeding
keywords.description: Has a chance to apply Weak to enemies that do not receive attack damage.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Storm
keywords.description:
Orb: Add a Randomized Power card to your hand at the start of turn.
Evoke: Gain 2 of the Storm buff.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Sun
keywords.description:
Orb: Whenever you draw a Summon monster, Upgrade it.
Evoke: Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Superheavy
keywords.description: When you Tribute a Superheavy for another Superheavy, gain 1 Dexterity.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Surge
keywords.description:
Orb: Whenever you Summon, gain 2 Block.
Evoke: Draw and discard 4 cards.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Tidal
keywords.description: When played, the power of one random effect of this card is increased by 1.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:TokenOrb
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, add 1 random Token to your hand.
Evoke: Set the cost of 2 random monsters in your hand to 0 for the turn.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Unstable
keywords.description: While in this Stance, you take 40% more damage.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Vines
keywords.description: At the end of turn, deal damage to ALL enemies. Damage total depends on the number of Vines and the number of Naturias currently summoned.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Void
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, siphon 2 Temporary HP from a random enemy.
Evoke: Play 1 Dark Hole.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Warrior
keywords.description: The first time you Tribute a Warrior for another Warrior each combat, choose any Stance to enter.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Water
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, draw 1 card.
Evoke: Draw 2 cards.
Water is unaffected by Focus.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:White
keywords.description:
Orb: Whenever draw a Spell or Trap, Upgrade it.
Evoke: Upgrade all cards in your hand.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Wyrm
keywords.description: The first time you Tribute a Wyrm for another each combat, double a random enemy's Poison.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:Zombie
keywords.description: When you Resummon a Zombie, gain 6 Block.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:buffer
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, have a chance to increase all of your buffs by 1. You have a higher chance if all monsters summoned are Spellcasters.
Evoke: Gain 1 Buffer.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:dragon
keywords.description: Dragons have a chance to apply Burning to their targets. When you Tribute a Dragon for another Dragon, gain 2 Dragonscales.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:gate
keywords.description:
Orb: At the start of turn, deal 4 damage to ALL enemies, gain 1 Energy and 5 Block.
Evoke: Effect cycles to the next Gate effect at the end of each turn (but with double the power).

keywords.name: Duelistmod:increment
keywords.description: Increase your maximum Summons by the number given.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:insect
keywords.description: When you Tribute an Insect monster for another Insect, apply 1 Poison to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:magnet
keywords.description: Tokens associated with the Magnet Warrior monsters. Magnets have no inherent effect.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:ojamania
keywords.description: Add 2 Randomized cards to your hand. Gain 1 random buff. Apply 2 random debuffs to an enemy.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:overflow
keywords.description: When a card with Overflow is in your hand at the end of the turn, activate an effect. This effect has a limited amount of uses.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:plant
keywords.description: When you Tribute a Plant monster for another Plant, apply 2 Constricted to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:predaplant
keywords.description:
When you Tribute a Predaplant monster for a Plant, apply 2 Constricted to ALL enemies.
When you Tribute a Predaplant for another Predaplant, apply 2 Constricted to ALL enemies and gain 1 Thorns.
Predaplant monsters are treated as Plants.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:reducer
keywords.description: Orb: Sets the cost 1 random card in your hand to 0 when Evoked. At the start of each turn, increase the number of cards that will be reduced.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:resummon
keywords.description: Certain cards (like Monster Reborn) allow you to Resummon monsters. When you Resummon a monster, it replays the card, ignoring Tribute costs. Some monsters have extra effects that trigger when they are Resummoned.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:spellcaster
keywords.description: When you attack, if all the monsters you currently have summoned are Spellcasters, gain 4 Block. You need to have at least 1 Spellcaster summoned to trigger this effect.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:summon
keywords.description: Counts monsters currently summoned. Maximum of 5 Summons.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:summoner
keywords.description:
Orb: Summon 1 Spellcaster Token at the end of turn.
Evoke: Increment 2.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:toon
keywords.description: Can only be played if Toon World is active. If you Tribute a Toon monster using another Toon, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Duelistmod:tribute
keywords.description: Removes X Summons. Unless you have enough Summons to Tribute, you cannot play a Tribute card.
